channel.title: Delta Mining Base
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Delta Mining Base By RuneSpace & Zhawa![/size]
Version 1 About to be Released! Heres some pictures of Full inventory and Start Mining. Will post more pictures after Runespace Fixes the Gem Bug ;D
Mining Starting and Recieving ore [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/d429d42f4a.jpg[/img] Not Enough Space, Mining stops. [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/eb469c2fb0.jpg[/img]
Latest Updates!
We have Finished the experience rates giving Double RuneScape Exp. All exp is in whole, not 35.6, Anything inbetween is rounded up to the next highest digit
We have Finished Gems, The rocks in Shilo Village now give Gems every 10 Fails
Fail to mine gem, Fail 2 more times, Get a noob gem. Fail 10 times, get a good gem ;D
Features include; (Red = Not Done, Yellow = Started, Green = Done)
[ul][li]Gem Mining[/li] [li]Fair Near-RS Experience Rates[/li] [li]Pickaxe Breaking and Repairing[/li] [li](Fun) Rock Golems[/li] [li]All rocks & Ores Mineable[/li] [li]Correct RS Levels for Rocks & Pickaxes[/li] [li]Wait for Ore Vein to refil before mining again, similar to Woodcutting stumps[/li][/ul]
Current Rocks Able to mine
Copper Tin Blurite Iron Silver Coal Gold Mithril Adamantite Runite Rune Essence Granite Sandstone Limestone Lunar Gem Rock
We will post some media as soon as we can, we are doing what rock gives what ore at the moment, we will give it a test after its finished!
[size=12pt]Credits[/size] [b]Zhawa RuneSpace Sir Jay Lin[/b]
[size=14pt]If you have any suggestions or Questions, Feel free to ask![/size]

item.title: Delta Mining Base
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

Updated! We have fixed the emote, Timers, Levels and Experience. RuneSpace is just remaking the gem method to fix a minor bug, hopefully we will be releasing it in the next hour!

Added some pictures ;D

EDIT: VERSION 1.0 RELEASED! LINK POSTED ABOVE

You remember the pick-head falling off xD that was funny… I think it was the wcing axes where their head would fly miles and you had to search under players to fricken find it :’(

item.title: Delta Mining Base
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:374752”]Glad to see someone post developments of a piece of their server and not a massive page of things they didn’t do.
Gl making this work.[/quote]

Thanks Reyx7

RuneSpace just finished the Respawn timers (Similar to Tree Stumps) so we are going to try that out. If all goes well, We will Release Version 1 today ;D

If you have any suggestions, let us know we would like to hear them!

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Mining Base
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Cool. Feel free to use this formula I made that calculates a reasonable time to mine a rock:

[code] public int getMiningDelay(client c)
{
int l = getMiningLevelNeeded();

	int delay = getMiningLevelNeeded() * 999;
	delay = delay / (getMiningLevel(c) * (50 + getPickaxe(c))) * 3 / 2;
	return delay;
}[/code]It was originally for a DeltaScape-based server so it should work for you. The pickaxe levels work as 0 is bronze, 5 is rune.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Mining Base
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

[size=24pt]Delta Mining Base By RuneSpace & Zhawa![/size]

Version 1 About to be Released!
Heres some pictures of Full inventory and Start Mining. Will post more pictures after Runespace Fixes the Gem Bug ;D

Mining Starting and Recieving ore

Not Enough Space, Mining stops.

Latest Updates!

We have Finished the experience rates giving Double RuneScape Exp. All exp is in whole, not 35.6, Anything inbetween is rounded up to the next highest digit

We have Finished Gems, The rocks in Shilo Village now give Gems every 10 Fails

Fail to mine gem, Fail 2 more times, Get a noob gem. Fail 10 times, get a good gem ;D

Features include;
(Red = Not Done, Yellow = Started, Green = Done)

[ul][li]Gem Mining[/li]
[li]Fair Near-RS Experience Rates[/li]
[li]Pickaxe Breaking and Repairing[/li]
li Rock Golems[/li]
[li]All rocks & Ores Mineable[/li]
[li]Correct RS Levels for Rocks & Pickaxes[/li]
[li]Wait for Ore Vein to refil before mining again, similar to Woodcutting stumps[/li][/ul]
